title: Good Value
text: Room was clean, staff was very friendly and helpful. No problem getting a late check-out. Location is decent for cruising the wharf- about 1.5 mile walk to the action, about 2 miles to Alcatraz Ferry. Never felt uncomfortable walking alone in the daytime, however I did not walk at night so don't know about that. I had a room close to Lombard so it was a bit noisy, but turning on the fan or AC effectively drowned that out. If you don't mind walking this is a great place to stay and save money by not renting a car.
